name: US Military Bridge Constructor
description:
Start your bridge construction career and become the real US bridge builder!!


Tips:

- Get cash reward after completing every mission successfully
- Complete every task within given time to get extra bonus
- Unlock new features and repair your road construction machines
- Remove mines from your way
- Mine explotion will cause level failed


Game Play Controls:

- Tilt
- Buttons
- Steering


Game Play Scenes:

- Rainy
- Sunny
- Snow Falling


Key Features:

- Realistic physics control
- HD graphics
- Virtual sound system
- 3D camera views
- Plenty of mines
- Heavy construction machinery
